description:
Learn to speak in Ukrainian via phrase book, tutorials. Fast, easy and fun way to learn Ukrainian.

App is continuously updated based on your feedback. Your 100% satisfaction is guaranteed.

App Tools include search.

Designed for English Speakers. Tap a phrase and it will be spoken for you in Ukrainian. Anytime, anywhere!

Meeting friends and co-workers from Ukraine could be much more fun with this app.

Focus is on everyday phrases and words. This app is categorized by following topics:



Includes following tutorials:

Why Learn Ukrainian,
Tips for effective language learning,
Number and Measures,
Vocabulary.


Includes following phrase books:

Greetings and General Words,
Phrases for Courtesy,
Food, Drink, and Going Out,
Places, People, and Family,
Sports and The Outdoors,
Dating,
Travelling Around,
General Questions,
Police Emergency,
Medical and Disaster Emergency,
Shopping.


What is unique about WagMob apps?

1) A touch friendly, quick reference app, which is always in your pocket and always works (no data connection required).

2) A companion app for on-the-go, bite-sized learning.

3) Offers value for money (a lifetime of free updates).

4) 250,000 paying customers from 155 Countries.



Our Vision: Provide on-the-go references that enable our customers to refer, learn and remember; easy to learn, more engaging and truly complete.

Our Mission: A WagMob app in every pocket.

Please write to us. We would love to improve this app.
